short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab with Tigers Theme Background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Change the background image on new tabs to feature cool Tigers and Tigers related images! The extension also provides users with a Custom Web Search on the New Tab powered by Microsoft Bing.

By installing "Tigers Tab" extension, you agree to the EULA and Privacy Policy, and to set your new tab page to Tigers Background.

Brought to you by Capitolina Ltd

Free stock media content is distributed by Unsplash - https://unsplash.com

By adding the "Tigers" extension to your browser, you're accepting its 
Terms of Service (Terms of Service: https://tigers-tab.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://tigers-tab.com/privacy.html)
